bug.author: mouradmourafiq
bug.summary: Sidecar warning is causing an error
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Describe the bug</denchmark-h>
In polyaxon 1.1.5 we are getting this permission denied error in the polyaxon-sidecar when running experiments. Where are using s3 as the default artifacts store:
artifactsStore: name: my-artifacts-store kind: s3 schema: bucket: "s3://our-outputs-bucket" secret: name: polyaxon-secrets <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/1261626/91535463-797b5e00-e913-11ea-9d44-af997eb65599.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>Expected behavior</denchmark-h>
It should show a warning instead of raising an error. <denchmark-h:h3>Environment</denchmark-h>
v1.1
